text: cng klaw theid (muhammad) wa phwk than ca mi khxy du phwk rea nxkcak hnung nı sxng sing thi di yeiym theanan læa rea k ca khxy du phwk than nı kar thi xallxhˌ ca thrng hı prasb kæ phwk than dwy kar lngthosʹ thima cak thi phraxngkh hrux dwy mux khxng phwk rea dangnan phwk cea cng khxy du pi theid thæcring phwk rea k ca pen phu khxy du phrxm kab phwk than dwy
